entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
